features.Enhanced Senses: The axehound gains an advantage on non-attack tests that rely on smell.
features.Minion: The axehound's attacks can't critically hit, and they're immediately defeated when they suffer an injury.

action.name: Strike: Bite
action.description: Attack +4, reach 5 ft., one target. Graze: 2 (1d4) keen damage. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) keen damage, and if the target is Medium or smaller, the axehound can spend 1 focus to knock the target Prone, then move up to 10 feet while dragging the target behind them.

bi_action.name: Pack Instincts
bi_action.description: While within 5 feet of an ally, the axehound can use the Gain Advantage action as ▷.

tri_action.name: On the Hunt
tri_action.description: After an enemy within 30 feet of the axehound falls Prone, the axehound moves up to 15 feet toward them.

free.name: Pack Instincts
free.description: While within 5 feet of an ally, the axehound can use the Gain Advantage action as ▷.

reaction.name: On the Hunt
reaction.description: After an enemy within 30 feet of the axehound falls Prone, the axehound moves up to 15 feet toward them.
